item.value: Alexander Graham Bell is credited with inventing the first telephone in 1876.
The shortfin Mako shark is the fastest fish, it can swim at 50 kilometres per hour. Olympic gold-medal swimmers could not escape even if they tried, they can only swim at 8 kph (5 mph) .
Alaska is the largest state in America.
There are 195 countries in the world and there are more than 2,700 languages.
The earth is the 3rd planet from the sun and is the 5th largest planet in our solar system.
There are more than 2,700 languages ( + more than 7,000 dialects) in the world. More than 1,000 different languages are spoken on the continent of Africa.
China has more than 350 million telephones, the most of any other country. The United States is second with 268 million.

The Spine-tailed Swift is the fastest bird. It can fly at 170 kilometres per hour (105mph). The Peregrine Falcon is the fastest bird that dives headfirst down through the sky. They can travel at up to 200mph.
By 2008 there were almost 1.3 billion telephone lines in the world.
The tallest person in the world was Robert Wadlow. He was 2.72 meters ( 8ft 11in ) tall. The tallest woman was Zeng Jinlian. She was 2.48 meters ( 8ft 2in ) tall.
The city with the largest population is Shanghai in China. It has almost 14 million inhabitants.
In 1972 Ray Tomlinson at BBN developed the first e-mail program. In his first email to himself, he uses the @ sign. This was the first time it appeared in an e-mail address.
The South Pole is the least sunny placeon earth with only 182 days a year off sunshine
Roughly 70 percent of an adult's body is made up of water.
There are more than 2,700 languages in the world.
In 1783 Jean Pilatre de Rozier ( a Frenchman ) made the first balloon flight, reaching a peak altitude of about 500 ft, and traveling about 51/2 mi in 20 min.
The longest river is the Nile. It is 6,650 Km ( 4,132 miles ) long. It flows into the Mediterranean Sea.
The biggest planet in the Solar System is Jupiter. It is 317 times as heavy as the earth
If you travelled to the Moon in a plane it would take about 16 days. It takes 3 days in a spaceship to get there.
Diamonds are the hardest substance known to man. A diamond is 58 times harder than the next hardest mineral on earth.
